        Sow Real Estate is a world-class luxury real estate super brand specializing in the delivery of both mass housing and luxury apartments. Renowned for its excellence in sales, marketing, and property management, Sow focuses on providing superior quality and infrastructure that reflects today's technological advancements. With an emphasis on perfection and detail in all projects, owning a Sow property offers a living experience like no other.

Job Position: Admin Assistant / Front Desk Receptionist

Job Location: Lekki Phase 1, Lagos

Role Overview

Key Responsibilities


	Receive visitors and manage basic admin duties and operations
	Answer calls, respond to enquiries, keep records
	Schedule appointments and maintain visitor/call logs
	Provide basic customer service and admin support

	Minimum of SSCE / OND / HND/Bsc
	Good spoken English and communication skills
	Basic computer skills (Word, email)

	Ability to commute to work easily highly preferable.

N100,000 - N150,000 / month. 

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and cover letter to: [email protected] and [email protected] using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Job Openings at Sow Real Estate Limited
content:
Sow Real Estate Nigeria Limited is a real estate company that is focused on delivering affordable housing with quality materials and achieving customer satisfaction.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Human Resources Manager

Job Locations: Asokoro - Abuja and Lekki Phase 1 - Lagos
Employment Type:

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a proactive and experienced Human Resources Manager to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing core HR functions and supporting organizational growth across our Lagos and Abuja operations.


Key Responsibilities


	Oversee end-to-end recruitment and talent management processes
	Develop and implement HR policies and procedures
	Manage staff records, payroll coordination, and compliance documentation
	Handle employee relations, disciplinary procedures, and conflict resolution
	Drive performance management and staff development initiatives
	Support management in strategic HR planning
	Coordinate administrative and facility-related functions (where applicable)


Requirements


	3–7 years of proven experience in Human Resources roles
	Strong knowledge of HR operations, policies, and compliance
	Experience in recruitment, onboarding, performance management, and employee relations
	Knowledge of Nigerian labor laws and HR best practices
	Strong communication and leadership skills
	High level of professionalism and confidentiality
	Knowledge of Facility Management is an added advantage.


What We’re Looking For:


	Detail-oriented and organized professional
	Strong leadership and decision-making ability
	Ability to manage multiple locations effectively
	Result-driven with strong people management skills


Application Closing Date: 14th March, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: [email protected] using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

2.) Admin Assistant / Front Desk Receptionist

Job Location: Lekki Phase 1, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Overview


	Friendly, professional Admin assistant/front desk receptionist to manage visitor reception, phone inquiries, appointments and basic office admin.


Key Responsibilities


	Receive visitors and manage basic admin duties and operations
	Answer calls, respond to enquiries, keep records
	Schedule appointments and maintain visitor/call logs
	Provide basic customer service and admin support


Requirements


	Minimum of SSCE / OND / HND/Bsc
	Good spoken English and communication skills
	Basic computer skills (Word, email)
	Organised, punctual, ability to multitask
	Previous experience working as an Admin/front desk assistant is a plus.
	Ability to commute to work easily highly preferable.


Salary
N100,000 - N150,000 / month. 

Application Closing Date: 28th February, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and cover letter to: [email protected] and [email protected] using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

3.) Investment Advisor (Luxury)

Job Locations: Lagos

Description


	We are seeking a highly skilled and polished Investment Advisor, Luxury to join our premium marketing team.
	This role is designed for a professional with an established high-net-worth clientele and a "passion for selling" luxury real estate.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage and grow a strong client base of high-net-worth individuals (HNIs) and premiuinvestors.
	Source, engage, and successfully close high-value transactions with high-net-worth clients.
	Successfully close high-value deals from ?50 million and above.
	Market and sell luxury and high-value real estate properties across prime locations.
	Provide expert investment advice tailored to the needs of HNIs and discerning clients.
	Conduct in-depth market research and analysis on luxury property trends and opportunities.
	Develop and present investment proposals with clear value propositions.
	Ensure a premium client experience that aligns with SOW Real Estate’s luxury standards.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Real Estate, Finance, or related field.
	Proven experience in luxury sales, investment advisory, or real estate consulting.
	Established access or exposure to a network of HNIs is a strong advantage.
	Excellent negotiation, communication, and presentation abilities.
	Confident, polished, and professional demeanor suitable for high-level client interactions.
	Demonstrated ability to meet and exceed sales targets, especially in the luxury market.


What We Offer


	Attractive compensation package and competitive commission structure.
	Pool car and driver for marketing activities.
	Access to premium property listings and exclusive investment opportunities.
	Assess to funds for digital marketing on various platforms
	A supportive, high-performance work environment.
	Opportunities for continuous professional growth.


Application Closing Date: 14th March, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover letter to: [email protected] using “Application – Investment Advisor, Luxury” as the subject of the email.

title: Job Vacancies at Bonzee Consulting
content:
Bonzee Consulting is a forward-thinking and people-oriented HR/Business Advisory company.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Admin Officer

Job Location: Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Summary


	The Administrative Officer will support daily office operations, attend to clients, process documents, handle basic accounting entries and assist with HR documentation and coordination.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Resume daily at the office and ensure the office runs smoothly.
	Attend to walk-in clients and respond to inquiries professionally.
	Manage incoming calls, emails, and correspondence.
	Process and properly file company documents (physical and electronic).
	Maintain organized client and company records.
	Monitor office supplies and report when restocking is required.
	Assist clients with document submission and check for completeness before processing.
	Maintain simple financial records using Microsoft Excel.
	Record daily transactions accurately.
	Prepare simple reports as required.
	Assist with staff documentation and onboarding paperwork.
	Maintain and update employee files.
	Schedule interviews and support basic HR coordination when required.
	Maintain confidentiality of company and staff information.


Salary
N100,000 - N150,000 / month.

Application Closing Date: 16th February, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: [email protected] using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Content Creator Job at Secom Limited




        
    

        
        Secom Limited is a premier consultancy firm delivering results-[driven solutions across revenue generation, financial services and HR Management.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:  Content Creator
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Cosmetics / FMCG

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a creative, marketing-driven Content Creator who can transform products and ideas into engaging digital content.
	The ideal candidate will create compelling short-form videos that support marketing campaigns, drive engagement, and enhance brand presence across social media platforms.


Key Responsibilities


	Create high-impact short-form videos and visual content for marketing campaigns.
	Translate marketing goals into engaging and conversion-focused content.
	Develop content aligned with trends, audience behavior, and brand messaging.
	Produce content optimized for Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and YouTube Shorts.
	Edit and deliver professional-quality videos that enhance brand visibility and engagement.
	Maintain brand consistency across all content outputs.


Qualifications & Experience


	OND, HND, or BSc in any discipline.
	1 – 2 years relevant experience in content creation, social media marketing, or digital media.
	Strong knowledge of social media marketing and content strategy.
	Proven experience creating short-form, marketing-focused video content.
	Ability to tell compelling brand and product stories visually.
	Proficiency in video editing tools and creative software.
	Detail-oriented with strong branding and consistency skills.
	Candidate must be proximate to Sabo, Yaba.


Salary
N150,000 / month

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: [email protected] using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
